column4: Why wont it let me install Breezy on my computer.. it installs and then its says that there are missing packages
i install the missing packages and it still wont work
RTFT??
because hoary doesnt support my video card
oh ok i see the top
Nvidia
hmm well when i install it
it wont startx
yeah i know
please don't use breezy
breezy on X is broken
please don't use breezy
i'm past that already
apparently not if it isn't starting
you do not need the proprietary drivers to get X to run
breezy is really not ready for non-experts yet
you'll have a lot less trouble if you reinstall with hoary
and linukso it didnt work
then undo whatever you did
it's really silly to change things you don't understand without either keepign track or backing things up
if you really have no idea, remove the files you installed (presumably nvidia.ko) and then do this in the terminal: "sudo dpkg -P --force-depends xserver-xorg ; sudo apt-get install xserver-xorg"
